title: Newbie No More
description: Complete the first level without using any hints.

title: Careful Thinker
description: Use no more than 2 hints across your first 3 levels.

title: Hint-Happy
description: Accumulate a total of 5 hints used in the game.

title: Steady Mind
description: Reach level 5 with fewer than 4 total hints used.

title: Probing the Net
description: Use at least 1 hint on three different levels.

title: Efficient Solver
description: Complete any 3 levels in a row without using a hint.

title: Curious Coder
description: Use 10 hints in total throughout the game.

title: Minimalist Hacker
description: Finish level 10 with fewer than 6 total hints used.

title: Hint Explorer
description: Try every type of hint at least once across any levels.

title: Speedy Solver
description: Complete a level using 0 hints within a short time frame.

title: Netropolis Navigator
description: Finish 15 levels with fewer than 10 total hints used.

title: Quantum Query
description: Use exactly 1 hint on every level from 5 to 10.

title: Backdoor Breaker
description: Complete 5 levels without using any hints at all.

title: Mentor Mode
description: Use 20 hints in total (across all levels).

title: Hint Mastery
description: Complete the entire game with 10 or fewer hints used in total.
